column2: for when you have one Function here spoken of as Func

column5:
=LAMBDA(func, items,
    LET(
        head, INDEX(items, 1),
        stops, SEQUENCE(ROWS(items)),
        IF(stops = 1,
            func(head),
            LET(
                tail_stops, 1 + SEQUENCE(ROWS(items) - 1),
                tails, INDEX(items, tail_stops),
                INDEX(function.map(func, tails), stops - 1)
))))
# Excel raises ValueError to refuse to print Function Names
